entries.content: Your job isn't to qualify in, it's actually to disqualify out. Deal with all the reasons why someone can't buy first.
entries.notes: Focuses on uncovering reasons for potential disinterest early.

entries.content: Figure out why we can't move forwards, not should we move forwards. If you figure out why not, what's left is likely able to move forward.
entries.notes: Directly addresses diagnosing the source of resistance or disinterest.

entries.content: Always go for no. Don't be scared to uncover potential reasons for not buying.
entries.notes: Embracing potential rejection encourages probing the prospect's position.

entries.content: Ask bloody hard questions, tough questions, challenging questions, uncomfortable questions.
entries.notes: A method for probing deeply to uncover the real reasons behind a prospect's stance, including disinterest.

entries.content: Manipulate to get to the truth. Use techniques to uncover the real reason behind a prospect's statements.
entries.notes: Applies to understanding the genuine reason for 'not interested'.

entries.content: Selling is a communication skill: The art of getting people to figure out through your questions that they need what you have. Requires being nurturing, empathetic, assertive.
entries.notes: Describes the tone and method for probing effectively and softly to understand the prospect's perspective.

focus_area: Handling "Not Interested": Probe softly, diagnose if disinterest or timing
